name: Latinx Program
description: The Latinx Program offers in-depth case management to Spanish-speaking women and work to support in a culturally appropriate setting.
fullDescription: The Latinx Program offers in-depth case management to Spanish-speaking women and work to support in a culturally appropriate setting.
whatTheyOffer: The Latinx Program offers in-depth case management for Spanish-speaking survivors of domestic violence, and works to support survivors in a culturally appropriate environment.
howToGetIt: If you would like to contact someone in this program, please leave us a message at (415) 969-6811 or send us an email at citas@womaninc.org
